channel.title: admin on Salil Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Salil Sharma

item.description: I am pursuing my PhD at the Delft University of Technology (TU Delft). I am working with Prof. Hans van Lint, Prof. Lori Tavasszy and Dr. Maaike Snelder. I am associated with DiTTLab and Freight & Logistics Lab at the TU Delft. I am interested to improve the reliability of traffic operations between port and hinterland as a part of the ToGRIP project. For these truck dominated motorways, my goal is to design advanced and innovative multi-class traffic management solutions.
